parameter.name: createdAfter
parameter.description: Selects email clicks that were created after the specified time.

parameter.name: createdBefore
parameter.description: Selects email clicks that were created before the specified time.

parameter.name: idGreaterThan
parameter.description: Selects email clicks with IDs greater than the specified integer.

parameter.name: listEmailId
parameter.description: Selects only email clicks generated by assets whose list email matches the specified ID.

parameter.name: dripProgramActionId
parameter.description: Selects only email clicks generated by the drip program action with the specified ID.

parameter.name: emailTemplateId
parameter.description: Selects only email clicks generated by the email template with the specified ID.

parameter.name: trackerRedirectId
parameter.description: Selects only email clicks generated by the tracker redirect with the specified ID.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Specifies the number of results to be returned.
